content.webTitle: John Vidal on the ethics of being an environment minister

fields.headline: Environment ministers' questionable ethics
fields.bodyText: What's the connection between Elliot Morley, Margaret Beckett, Chris Huhne, Oliver Letwin and David Chaytor? Yes, these senior MPs have all been accused of milking expenses. But they have also been either an environment secretary, environment minister, shadow environment minister or a member of the Environmental Audit Select Committee. Explanations, please, on how these accusations could arise in an area of public life that particularly purports to promote ethical and responsible behaviour.
